channel.title: General Stuff Blogging Slacker on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Stuff Blogging Slacker on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: I am once again a bad blogger.
item.description: So I haven’t been updating as much as I should. I don’t really know why. I have a LOT to blog about. In the past month - I have met some really cool people, attempted to learn python better, got and hacked a bunch with an OLPC. visited and gave a interesting tech talk to Google, hosted a CHIPY meeting and went to the mysql conf in Santa Clara. These are all things that deserve at least one entry if not more than one.
